wikipedia_page.main: Albert Thomas Sutton (11 December 1874 – 2 November 1946) was an Australian politician who represented the South Australian House of Assembly multi-member seat of East Torrens from 1927 to 1930 for the Liberal Federation.In local politics, he was mayor of the Corporate Town of St Peters from 1923 to 1926.

link_mentions.page: Members of the South Australian House of Assembly, 1927–1930

response: * Albert Sutton (1866–1923), partner in the architecture firm Sutton & Whitney, based in Portland, Oregon, United States
